page.title: 05Andrew's week
page.content: I am 8 years old. On weekdays, I wake up at 7.30 and put on my uniform and get ready for school. I have cornflakes and toast for breakfast and then I help with the washing-up -most of my friends have dishwashers. I walk to school with Mum, my 2 sisters and dog. School starts at 8.55. We go to our classrooms. First my teacher takes the register, then we book in for dinner at the secretary's office. After assembly, we do Maths and English until dinner time. I have hot dinners. At lunch time we play ball or running games. In the afternoon we do topic, Games and have a story. We go home at 3.30. When I get home, I change. On Wednesday I go to swimming classes. I also go to cubs. I like Saturday best when I go to work with my Dad. I wear overalls and help with the JCBs. I help in the garden too.
